channel.title: ::switch
channel.description:
STILL NEED HELP, OTHER GUY LOGGED OFF
I normally do not ask for help, but i am completely puzzled. i have tried very many times to get this right, but it never works. Does anyone have the ::switch command i could add to my client.java? i need to move on in my server programming and i cant get past this. thanks for your help.

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @ph3nom ph3nom
item.description:
@ph3nom wrote:

well now i have 100 plus errors, and i cant fix it… i removed it now i still have them… idk wth

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:2, topic:226880”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) { playerAncients = 1 sendMessage("You convert to ancient magiks!"); }

Another very basic command, might work but if not, il post the long one.[/quote]

Seriously?
A, That will give errors.
B, playerAncients isnt declared in your post.
C, It wont even work.

[quote=“Runeblade912, post:4, topic:226880”]Here is my way of doing it.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
                if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) {
                    if (playerAncientMagics == true) {
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
                        playerAncientMagics = false;
                        ancients = 0;
                    } else {
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
                        ancients = 1;
                        playerAncientMagics = true;
                    }
                }
            }

Tell me if you get any errors.[/quote]

Now, thats better

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

Here is my way of doing it.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
                if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) {
                    if (playerAncientMagics == true) {
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
                        playerAncientMagics = false;
                        ancients = 0;
                    } else {
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
                        setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
                        ancients = 1;
                        playerAncientMagics = true;
                    }
                }
            }

Tell me if you get any errors.

Read full topic
